{{No footnotes|date=May 2010}} [[File:Map of USA NV.svg|thumb|Location of the [[State of Nevada]] in the [[United States of America]]]] This is a '''list of symbols of the [[U.S.]] [[State of Nevada]]'''. The majority of the items in the list are officially recognized symbols created by an act of the [[Nevada Legislature]] and signed into law by the [[Governor of Nevada|governor]]. ==Miscellaneous== {| class="wikitable" |- ! width="20%" | Type ! width="40%" | Symbol ! width="15%" | Year ! width="15%" | Image |- |'''[[State flag|Flag]]''' |[[Seal of Nevada|State seal]] on a blue background |align="center"|1929 |align="center"|[[File:Flag of Nevada.svg|100px|Nevada flag]] |- |'''[[List of U.S. state mottos|Motto]]''' |''All for our country'' |align="center"|1886 |align="center"| |- |'''[[List of U.S. state nicknames|Nicknames]]''' |Silver State |align="center"|n/a | |- |'''[[Seals of the U.S. states|Seal]]''' |The [[Seal of Nevada]] |align="center"|1886 |align="center"| |} ==Flora== {| class="wikitable" |- ! width="20%" | Type ! width="40%" | Symbol ! width="15%" | Year ! width="15%" | Image |- |'''[[List of U.S. state flowers|Flower]]''' |[[Sagebrush]]
(''Artemisia tridentata'') |align="center"|1917 |align="center"|[[File:Sagebrush.jpg|100px|Sagebrush]] |- |'''[[List of U.S. state trees|Tree]]''' |[[Single-leaf Pinyon]]
(''Pinus monophylla'') |align="center"|1953 |align="center"|[[File:Single-leaf pinyon 1.jpg|100px|Single-leaf Pinyon]] |} ==Fauna== {| class="wikitable" |- ! width="20%" | Type ! width="40%" | Symbol ! width="15%" | Year ! width="15%" | Image |- |'''[[List of U.S. state birds|Bird]]''' |[[Mountain Bluebird]]
(''Sialia currucoides'') |align="center"|1967 |align="center"|[[File:Mountain Bluebird.jpg|100px|Mountain Bluebird]] |- |'''[[List of U.S. state mammals|Animal]]''' |[[Desert Bighorn Sheep]]
(''Ovis canadensis nelsoni'') |align="center"|1973 |align="center"|[[File:Desert Bighorn Barna Cropped.jpg|100px|Desert Bighorn Sheep]] |- |'''[[List of U.S. state fish|Fish]]''' |[[Lahontan cutthroat trout]]
(''Salmo clarki henshawi'') | |align="center"|[[File:Lahontan pyramid.jpg|100px|Cutthroat Trout]] |- |'''[[List of U.S. state reptiles|Reptile]]''' |[[Desert Tortoise]]
(''Gopherus agassizii'') |align="center"|1989 |align="center"|[[File:Gopherus agassizii.jpg|100px|Desert Tortoise]] |} ==Geology== {| class="wikitable" |- ! width="20%" | Type ! width="40%" | Symbol ! width="15%" | Year ! width="15%" | Image |- |'''[[List of U.S. state minerals, rocks, stones and gemstones|Mineral]]''' |[[Silver]] |align="center"|1977 |align="center"|[[File:SilverUSGOV.jpg|100px|Silver]] |- |'''Rock''' |[[Sandstone]] |align="center"|1987 |align="center"|[[File:Millet-Seed Sandstone Macro.JPG|100px|Sandstone]] |- |} ==See also== *[[List of Nevada-related topics]] *[[Lists of United States state insignia]] *[[State of Nevada]] ==References== {{Reflist|2}} ==External links== *[http://firstlady.state.nv.us/NevadaStateSymbols.htm Nevada State Symbols] {{Nevada|collapsed}} {{state symbols|collapsed}} [[Category:Nevada-related lists|State symbols]] [[Category:Lists of United States state symbols by state|Nevada]] [[Category:Symbols of Nevada| ]]
